rightBuildingVariant.description: A string to determine which building variant to create for the right side of the street. Can use only provided variants from enum array

leftBuildingVariant.description: A string to determine which building variant to create for the left side of the street. Can use only provided variants from enum array

width.description: street width in imperial feet units

segments.description: list of segments of a cross-section perspective of the 3D scene, each with a width in imperial feet units, a type in string format, and a variantString that applies modifications to the segment type

width.description: segment width in imperial feet units

variantString.description: Variant of segment. It's required propery. List of possible variants depend upon which segment type is selected. variantString values are separated with their subvariants by a pipe character (literally '|'). Drive-lane segments variants: 'inbound|car' (default variant) or 'outbound|car'. Sidewalk segments variants: empty/sparse/normal/dense variants, depends on pedestrian count, default is 'normal'. Sidewalk could have a lamps (sidewalk-lamp type of segment), variants - right, left, both; and subvariants (through |) - modern, traditional, pride. For example - 'right|modern'. Turn lane (turn-lane segment type) variants: left, right, left-right-straight, shared, both, left-straight, right-straight, straight. Sidewalk tree variants: palm-tree, big. Parking-lane variants: sideways (right/left subvariants), inbound or outbound (right/left subvariants), angled-front-left, angled-front-right, angled-rear-left, angled-rear-right.

type.description: street segment type. Using default width for each segment from streetmix API. Use default variant for each type of segment

elevation.description: elevation level for segment. 1 is default for all type of sidewalks and buildings, 0 is default for roads, lanes, parking, etc
